about_the_game:
"Heroes Stand Tall: M.E.T.A"

is an adrenaline-pumping arena shooter set in the dynamic digital realm of the Digiverse. Focused within the confines of the HST Arena, players engage in fast-paced, close-quarters combat in player-versus-player (PvP) deathmatch battles, gamers immerse themselves in thrilling matches where every moment counts.

Diverse and unique characters await, offering players a variety of options to dominate as a Hero within the Arena. Whether wielding rapid-fire rifles, devastating shotguns, or precision sniper rifles, players have access to a variety of weapons to excel in the heat of battle.

As players navigate through the Arena, they'll utilize advanced movement mechanics to gain tactical advantages, securing victory through skillful manoeuvring and precise aim. Embracing the M.E.T.A - Most Effective Tactics Available - becomes the key to mastering the arena and achieving unparalleled success.

"Heroes Stand Tall: M.E.T.A" isn't just a game—it's a journey of redemption, unity, and perseverance. Will you rise to the challenge, harness the power of M.E.T.A, and stand tall in the face of adversity? Join the battle and make your mark in the digital arena today...

"Be a hero in what you do and always stand tall!"
The Stereo

content_descriptors.notes:
1. Intense Action: Prepare for fast-paced and intense action sequences, keeping you engaged with frequent combat encounters.
2. Adrenaline-Fueled Gameplay: Dive into the heart of battle with constant engagement in player vs. player gunfights and strategic manoeuvres, ensuring an exhilarating gaming experience.
3. Variety of Weapons: Arm yourself with a diverse arsenal, ranging from firearms to explosives, each offering unique characteristics and effects to suit your playstyle.
4. Immersive Visuals: Experience the thrill of combat without blood and gore or dismemberment; instead, immerse yourself in electric sparks for a visually captivating experience.
5. In-Game Communication: Utilize the in-game chat feature to communicate with other players. Be aware that interactions may introduce mature content, including language, trash-talking, and other forms of online behaviour.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit or Windows® 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K / Core™ i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

In the HST Arena, players engage in intense PvP deathmatches, wielding diverse weapons as Heroes. Victory requires strategic prowess and precise aim. Embrace the M.E.T.A, Be A Hero and Stand Tall.
